It was normal for Nightshift to have a walk around the parameters every day=
, just to keep an eye on things.  But today felt strange, as if he had a fe=
eling that he needed to stay on his patrol just a bit longer.  It was intui=
tion playing a strong roll and he begins scanning deeper, sensing something=
 is not quite right.

" Hmm?  Why do I have the feel'n something's out here=
 that doesn't belong?  I better cover all my bases this time."

So onward t=
he black cat skulks, perhaps coming across something or someone who has no =
business being around the property.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "adamsa=
fran" <adamsafran@...> wrote:
>
> 
> > As BLACKARACHNIA sneaks stealthily t=
owards the ARK she can see TUCSON
> > hovering over head over the MAXIMALS =
and PREDACONS around the cave.
> > 
> > Ahead of her she can see the ARK as=
 well as some of the MAXIMALS
> > moving around, presumably on guard duty" =
WOLFGANG and RAMULUS are
> > standing outside, looking around casually. The=
y do not look to be
> > expecting trouble so have gotten somewhat lax.
> > =

> > Behind them is the ARK and just inside the opening of the ARK is a
> >=
 smaller ship, one designed to carry several mechs. Occasionally
> > severa=
l individuals go to and from it from inside the ARK as if
> > packing it wi=
th things. LEO PRIME can be seen directing matters.
> > 
> 
> Going along t=
hen, stealthily along the area, BLACKARACHNIA ponders.  She doesn't want to=
 risk a firefight yet with the MAXIMALS, but she has to bypass thier patrol=
s..  So how to best go about that?
> 
> She settles back to watch, waiting =
for the pair to be 'relieved', figuring that at the moment the two are watc=
hing the next group coming out on guard duty, she can sneak past both distr=
acted groups, and head on in to her prize..
> 
> The ARK.
>
